alert.note: Alert for Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 11:30AM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. * WHERE...Southern Somerset County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Monday. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
